articles.content: An expert panel Wednesday recommended the removal of the clinical trial mode label attached to the emergency authorisation of Bharat Biotechs Covid-19 vaccine Covaxin, The Indian Express has learnt.… [+3853 chars]

articles.content: India will take on New Zealand in the final of the inaugural World Test Championship in a bio-secure bubble at the Hampshire Bowl in Southampton from June 18-22, the game’s governing body ICC said on… [+2215 chars]
